meta.title: GMIJ - Full Stack Engineer | 15 Years Dev Experience | Open Source Contributor
meta.description: GMIJ, 15 years .NET full stack development experience, 5 years technical management experience. Focused on DevOps, continuous integration, team management. Active in SmartSql, Ant Design Blazor and other open source projects.
meta.keywords: GMIJ, Full Stack Engineer, .NET Development, DevOps, Open Source, SmartSql, Ant Design Blazor, DynamicWallpaper, Audio3A_CSharp, Technical Management, R&D Director, AI Programming, Spec-Kit, AI Voice Interaction

header.name: GMIJ
header.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer Â· Open Source Contributor Â· Tech Lead

items.title: AI Programming Expert
items.description: Proficient in AI programming tools like **Spec-Kit**, leveraging AI-assisted development to boost efficiency. Deep expertise in **AI voice interaction**, led development of .NET native audio 3A processing SDK with hands-on experience in AI-driven software development.

items.title: Development Experience
items.description: 2002-2017, **15 years** focused on .NET development as a full stack engineer. Committed to code quality with regular refactoring practices and maintaining high standards.

items.title: DevOps Expert
items.description: Proficient in DevOps practices, specializing in continuous integration with **TeamCity**, driving team automation and efficiency improvements.

items.title: Management Experience
items.description: 2017-2023, **5 years** of management experience. Served as R&D Director (**20+** team) and Operations Director (**70+** on-site ops team). Specialized in building teams from scratch, growing annual operations contract value from 1M to nearly **20M CNY**.

leadProjects.name: DynamicWallpaper
leadProjects.description: Dynamic wallpaper project providing beautiful wallpaper resources and dynamic wallpaper experience. Built with modern technology stack for smooth user experience.

leadProjects.name: Audio3A_CSharp
leadProjects.description: AI-written .NET native audio 3A processing SDK. Supports noise reduction, echo cancellation, auto gain control and more.

leadProjects.name: Green Software Download Site
leadProjects.description: AI-written resource download site providing green, secure software downloads. Focus on user experience and resource quality.

leadProjects.name: Children Image
leadProjects.description: AI-written children's handwritten newspaper generator, supporting H5 and WeChat Mini Program. Generate beautiful handwritten newspapers with one sentence, designed for kindergarten parents.

leadProjects.name: ZerotierFix
leadProjects.description: AI-enhanced unofficial ZeroTier Android client with improved global routing. Supports self-hosted Moon servers, custom Planet config, peer list viewing, and more for personal VPN setup.
